facts.statement: If  Kylian Mbappe receives a yellow card in today's match, he will be suspended after collecting 2 yellow cards so far this season.
Manchester United haven't lost in their last 4 games.
The result of the first leg: Manchester United - Paris Saint-Germain 0-2.
Paris Saint-Germain have won 7 home matches in a row.
Manchester United have a winning streak of 8 matches away from home.
Paris Saint-Germain have a winning streak of 8 matches.
Paris Saint-Germain wins 1st half in 55% of their matches, Manchester United in 44% of their matches.
Paris Saint-Germain wins 55% of halftimes, Manchester United wins 44%.
Paris Saint-Germain's performance of the last 5 matches is better than Manchester United's.
In UEFA Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain has better performance than Manchester United.
The winner of their last meeting was Paris Saint-Germain.
On their last meeting Paris Saint-Germain won by 2 goals.
Paris Saint-Germain scores 3.29 goals when playing at home and Manchester United scores 1.66 goals when playing away (on average).
When Paris Saint-Germain leads 1-0 at home, they win in 95% of their matches.
When Manchester United leads 0-1 away, they win in 100% of their matches.
When Paris Saint-Germain is down 0-1 home, they win 25% of their matches.
When Manchester United is down 1-0 away, they win 21% of their matches.
1-2 in today's game is enough for Paris Saint-Germain to go through to the next round, by leading 3-2 on aggregate.
The current draw (3-3) on aggregate is enough for Manchester United to reach the next round on away goals.
Paris Saint-Germain have scored at least one goal for 43 consecutive matches.
If  Kylian Mbappe scores against Manchester United it will be his 5th goal for Paris Saint-Germain this season.
Manchester United is ready for the next round after winning on more away goals, after 3-3 on aggregate.
